content: Wade Boggs. He's a Hall of Fame baseball guy

who drank 70 beers on
a cross-country flight.
We're gonna beat that record.
That's why I booked us these tickets.

Uh, I thought we were flying to Los Angeles
for the Women's March.

Mm-hmm. You are correct that
this is an all-female flight
on the way to the Women's March...
...but I don't give a shit about that.
It's about the Boggs thing.
I didn't know it was an all-female flight.
That feels dangerous.
What are you... no, hey! Come on!

- Oh!
- Can't smoke on an airplane.
Goddamn, when's the last time you flew?
Yeah, I don't get it. You already did this.

Shouldn't we do our own thing?
Why are we copying the guys?
No, that's the whole point.

It's the same exact thing,
but it's with women.
Right? So it's a new idea.

Okay, I just feel
that if it's all with women,

- then it should be better.
- Why can't we just do the same thing?

Because if we do the same thing
then why are we doing it at all?
Yeah, I got to say I agree with that.

I mean, why can't we just come
up with our own record to break?

Like some badass woman who
could really throw them back?
You know, Judy Garland, Liz Taylor...
Joan Crawford...
Betty Ford!
No.
Those are all sad examples of alcohol abuse.

The Boggs thing just feels more fun,
you know?
When women do it, it just feels sad.

Okay. So, last time,
Mac was commissioner,

but I figured I could
do that and participate
because women are excellent multitaskers.
What kind of plane is this?

How come the coloreds
are allowed to sit up front
with the whites and we're way back here?

Wow. I never heard you talk so much.
Truly awful.

What is going on with her?
Why is she so perky?
She ate all her nicotine patches already.

Ate them?! What?
You're not supposed to eat them.
Oh, my God, there was a two-week supply.
You know what? Who cares? Who cares?
In that case, since you're all hopped up,
you be the commissioner. Okay?

Just mark everybody's shirts
every time they finish a beer.
Hello ladies and ladies.

- Yeah!
- My copilot Patricia and I

just wanted to welcome you
aboard our all-female flight
en route to the Women's March.
Hell yeah! Can't wait.
Oh, no. Two women pilots.

- I'm getting out of here.
- No, no, no. S-Sit down.

Sit down.
You're not getting... everything's fine.
You're not getting off. Sit down.

We're in mid-goddamn-air.
You know what? Drink your beer.
That'll calm your nerves. My goodness. Okay.

Keep going like that,
we might have ourselves a real scrimmage.
She's gonna be passed out by Indiana.

Just mark her shirt off while
she's still in the game.
Was not expecting this line.
Why do women pee so much?

Uh, lady, thank you so much
for saving my spot.

- I wasn't.
- All right, shut up.
What's with this line? It hasn't moved.

Excuse me, excuse me.
Mm-hmm, mm-hmm, mm-hmm.
Mark me.
All right. Nine, huh?

- Yeah.
- Nine, Waitress.
Very nice. I like that.
Some record chugging. What's your secret?

- I'm an alcoholic.
- That'll do it.
Artemis, one? Only one? Come on.

Just feels lazy and uninspired
to do exactly what the men did.
Let's at least beat a female sports star.
Ooh, I like that idea. Like who?
Secretariat?
The racehorse?
I like that. Let's beat a Secretariat.

Mm, I don't like that she
was named after a secretary.
She should be a boss. But fine.

I don't get into this bathroom
soon I'm gonna shit my pants!

Yes! Do it! See?
That's what I'm talking about.

Gross-out humor.
It's like taking the original

to the next level. See?
Nobody expects that from women.
It's so much more shocking, isn't it?

Give me that, give me that,
give me that mark.
Oh. Here we go.
Yes. Thank you. Wait, wait, wait, wait.

- I need two more beers.
- We're out.
No problemo.
I planned for this.
Mm-hmm.
They don't check medical bags.
See? The guys didn't do that last time.
How's that for originality?
What-what the hell?
Where-where are my beers?

for all my merchandise.

Just, uh, crystals,
worry dolls, dream catchers,
labia rings... your basics.
I'm gonna make big money in California.

and clean orgasms.
Ooh, I want to... I-I want to 'gasm.
See? Lookin' at my first customer.
Yeah, okay, look, I love a scam.

I-I love to scam pathetic,
sad, lonely women.
But let's wait till we get to California.
For now, I need to get you drunk.
I need beers. Goddamn it.
All right. Hey, hey!
Hey, you! Servant!
Hold on a sec. Servant.
Oh, dear God.
How do I keep winding up with you people?
Do I know you?
Do you...
I used to work at Guigino's.
And then I moved to Minnesota
and I waited on you guys at the Super Bowl.

- Nothing? Mm?
- Nope.

- Forget it, forget it, forget it.
- Nope. Nope.
What can I do for ya?
Hold on a second.
How come you're a man servant?

Shouldn't there be a woman servant

Well, it's "flight attendant,"

because I think women have been
disrespected for far too long

and I wanted to honor them
and be their champion...
Great. You're a soy boy beta cuck.

- A what?
- Whatever.
Look, uh, we're doing the Boggs thing.
I don't know what that is.
Wade Boggs.
Okay. Is that a person's name or...

Doesn't matter. Uh, listen, we're gonna need
about 50 beers each, all right?
And you can put it on the Boggs account.

Just make sure you keep all the ladies
in the white tees lubricated.

Okay. I'm afraid we don't have any beer,
is the thing.

- What? What did you say?
- Yeah.

Uh, in honor of the Women's March,
we are serving pink wine.
So we only have rosé.

- Right. Okay.
- Yeah.
Cute. Great.
Uh, we'll take a shit ton of pink wine.

- Thank you.
- Okay. You're welcome.
Come on. I got news.
I do, too, and it's bad news.
I just found out Secretariat was a boy.
All racehorses are male.
I know, because I find them so attractive.

Well, that's messed up.
Why-why woman horses can't race?
They should be able...
They can run just as fast as the boy horses.

- That's not what we're ta...
- They should march.

- Pussies on the track.
- Getting off track. That's not...

- Pussies on the track.
- What are you doing?

- Pussies on the track.
- Shut up! Stop it!

- We should not drink in protest.
- Stop! Shut up! Okay?
Shut up!

It's all right. It's all right,
'cause I got a new plan.

Check this out.

and beat her rival, Chris Evert,
at the California Open.

- Mm-hmm.

So now we're gonna try to
beat Martina Tinatinova...
No, goddamn it! We're doing the Boggs thing.
We're still doing the Boggs thing,

And we're also switching to pink wine.

How's that, Artemis, for switching it up?
Trying new stuff?

You can't just change one

...the athlete, and the bag!

- Okay!
Well, there you go. Did you hear that?
You happy? Okay, great.
So, we're all settled.

percent alcohol content
and rosé has a 12% alcohol content.

Oh, dear! Watching a woman
do math scares me!

Okay, so every little
airplane bottle of wine
will equal 2.4 beers,
so we'd have to drink

29.17 bottles of wine
to equal 70 beers. Okay.

So let's just call it
an even 29 to win. Good?
Nerd.

Oh... We're doing a good job

Oh, yeah. We're tearing it up.
Tearing it up.
Yeah. Okay. Whoo!

Man, it is sad that there

'cause, I mean, I am all horned up.
Well, there is a-a male servant.
Oh, yeah? Hot?
No. Soy boy beta cuck.

I know, but, uh,
don't get distracted by that, okay?

they made a side bet, you know.

North Dakota to avoid her.
He was... He was the first one out.

So-so Dennis had sex on the plane,
how-how many women?

- Hm...
...don't get distracted by that.
Well, I'm gonna beat his record.
There's only one man on this flight.
Okay, well, I will figure something out.

No, no, no. Stop. Stop it, okay?
Kno-Knock it off.

You're my Chris Evert.
You're my rival, okay?

The only reason you're here
is so that my hatred of you
can fuel my desire to beat you, okay?
So I need you staying in the game.
Okay. Then I'm gonna beat you, you skank.
Yes. that is the spirit.

The only way to beat men is by
competing against other women.
Here's to that.
Oh.

- Oh, it hurts so much...
- Where the hell is he?

- I dinged that goddamn thing ten years ago.
- Yeah.

as well as the lapis lazuli.

- All right. All right.

Why wait for California

Here. Drink this.
Mm-mm.
What is that? Oh, my God.

Are you trying to poison me?
That's not alcohol.
No, it's my special "uni-tea."
Well, it's selling like hotcakes.
Drink up, ladies.
It helps your prostate.
Women don't have a prostate, goddammit.
Or is that what men want you to believe?

Six is pathetic, even for you.

All right, goddammit,

Yeah.

- Oh, oh.
- Yes.

Oh, hello, Deandra.

Nice. I underestimated you, champ.

A real man.
Yo!

Frank. What...

No. No, goddamn it.
This is my all-female version.
You're not supposed to be here.

- No.
- Hey.
I heard there's a man back here.

I'm gonna need more wine.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, drink slave.

Whoa. Coach people

Oh.
